General.Name: GORE German Office Real Estate AG
General.Description: GORE German Office Real Estate AG engages in the real estate investment business in Germany. It invests in commercial properties. The company was formerly known as Münchner Immobilien Center AG and changed its name to GORE German Office Real Estate AG in November 2019. GORE German Office Real Estate AG was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
General.Address: Bockenheimer Landstr. 17-19, Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 60325
